lead_paragraph: California fired Coach Ben Braun after another disappointing season in which the Golden Bears missed the N.C.A.A. tournament. Braun spent 12 years at Cal and made the tournament five times. But the Bears went to the N.C.A.A. tournament only once in his final five seasons. Cal finished ninth in the Pacific-10 this season, going 17-16 over all and 6-12 in the conference.
